item.title: (Release) Ice Sword + Ints(Release)
item.dc:creator: @Mighty_Penguin Mighty Penguin
item.description:
@Mighty_Penguin wrote:

king pin745:

lol. i doubt he’d mind… but i kinda wanted this to work because it’s my first custom added model. i usually do it through a program i made but i figured that it was easier to do it manually (lol) i’m just getting mad cuz i wanted that sword. lolz!

Lol,also the sword model is right client sided except the server side the item.cfg results in a Dc. (Kick) and it won’t work but if I delete the sword and it crappy again then… Its works! Anyway nice job. =)

}

@T33J4Y wrote:

Edit: Here’s link for the other one. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,373174.0.html

item.title: (Release) Ice Sword + Ints(Release)
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

This is my first released sword that I didn’t really spend a whole lot of time on but I think it looks pretty cool in game.
Ints(Put this in your class8.java)

[code]if(i == 13789) {
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anInt174 = 14899;
class8.anInt181 = 2000;
class8.anInt190 = 572;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 25;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 14900;
class8.anInt200 = 14900;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.aString170 = “Tj’s Sword”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A sword made by Tj.”.getBytes();

}[/code]
Put this is your Item.cfg (server side)
item = 13789 Tj’s_Sword A_sword_made_by_TJ. 2147000 2147000 2147000 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 0 0 0 0 0 0 0

Models (put these in your models folder)
http://uppit.com/v/XVC3I5UU

Read full topic
